title: E-Learning Practical Skills Enhancement: Job Competency Development Program Through Reflective Inquiry and Action Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific inquiry methods and relevant work experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners analyze personal workflows by writing at least three structured reflective journals.
Learners derive at least one organizational problem-solving solution through action learning group activities.
Learners develop action plans to improve work efficiency by 20% or more by applying a reflection-practice cycle.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
